item.title: About M.S.G.
item.description: Once upon a time like a thousand years ago we had a conversation that was like “why isn’t there a S.A.S.S. about food?” and the end result was let’s do this. We talk about food, you drink couple hundred beers, everyone wins. Sarah Lohman of Four Pounds Flour is a historic gastronomist dedicated to uncovering the flavors of the past and using them to inspire contemporary cooking. She’ll drink colonial cocktails at daybreak and eat a moose’s face, all in the name of history.
